pages.title: Match game
pages.text: Elemental Shield is a defense mechanism that can resist damage.

The Elemental Shield capacity of a natural creature is usually higher than its own HP, but won't be more than twice its maximum HP. $(br2)Element shield can reduce the power of non-magic damage and reduce the magic damage different from its own element shield attribute to a certain extent. Only the attack from same element can achieve the maximum benefit of damaging the Elemental Shield. $(br2)Players can produce Elemental Shields in a short period of time by drinking Shield Capacity potion. $(br2)Melee weapons wrapped with elemental strings can also effectively damage Elemental Shields.
